data.what_is: Nurture and grow your audience with Force24, the powerful marketing automation platform that makes meaningful conversations happen 24-hours a day.
data.product_description: Force24 is a Software-as-a-service Marketing Automation platform that offers a fully managed service from data acquisition, to creative artwork, to cross channel, automated campaign execution.Founded in 2010, Force24 is now the UK's fastest-growing marketing automation platform. But our tech is just the tip of the iceberg. We have a passionate team of experts, with skills ranging from strategy and design to automation. Once you join forces with us - our team is your team!You can expect a two-minute response time when you get in touch, as well as help from an expert who knows the challenges you're facing on a daily basis. Plus, our tech is fairly priced. Because we believe everyone (even the little guy) deserves access to tools tat help them cut through the noise.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 28 Force24 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 26 Force24 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 18 Force24 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 28 Force24 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 21 Force24 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 29 Force24 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments

features.name: Performance and Reliability

features.name: Output Document Generation

features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords. 48 reviewers of Force24 have provided feedback on this feature.

A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration

Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

initial_reviews.review_title: Next Level Automated Marketing
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
We were recommended Force24 through our business partner, and given the pain points of the system we were using, we jumped at the opportunity. We were immediately impressed with the UI; it was far more intuitive and accessible. Furthermore, the aspect of automated journeys and the journey manager was way ahead of anything we had seen or used before. This is probably the defining feature; now we have an integration live with our CRM, and we are running several fully autonomous campaigns, which churn out lists of warm leads for our business. With a careful set-up, guided by the plethora of available training material, we found our feet quickly and are already seeing ROI, which we expect to increase as we continue to learn.

What do you dislike about Force24?
We found the editor to be an improvement on our previous system, but still, it can be a little painful. We found the workaround to this, and a very welcome feature is the ability to edit the RAW HTML of the email. While this offers full control over the design, it does require a beginner level of HTML knowledge. Some training on this would be beneficial, mainly as your usual graphic designer or marketer is not likely to be well-versed in HTML and/or CSS.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Force 24 is helping us to work through massive lists of 'passive' contacts on our CRM and work them in the background, encouraging the move to the 'active' market and reducing the number of wasted calls made by our consultants. By providing users with warm leads, ROI is taking a boost as we can get to the right people, quicker.

initial_reviews.review_title: Early days but excellent customer support so far
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Force24 has allowed us to take our email campaigns to the next level by integrating with HubSpot, meaning we can not only sync up our CRM but allow our website, CRM and F24 so work seamlessly and remove the manual intervention which has dragged us down in the past.

What do you dislike about Force24?
It's too early to say at the moment as we are fairly new to the platform. The only dislike has come from one or two of our content marketers when first using the platform to build emails but this was purely due to the usual teething problems of learning the platform and how it's laid out, the terminology etc which is slightly different to what they are used to. However, this isn't even a problem now since they are becoming more accustomed to it as we ramp up our usage.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our current platform has no integration to our CRM (HubSpot), therefore we have a large chasm between sales and marketing and need a lot of manual intervention to link anything up. The other solution the platform provides is that it gives us the level of automation for multi-step email campaigns we were looking for, as well as providing more flexibility through it's website tracking capabilities.

initial_reviews.review_title: A very sophisticated system that can really enhance your E-Shot & Lead Gen capabilities
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The automatic filtering and creation of lists from our CRM is particularly useful. We deal with a diverse range of customers, and by being able to segment them as to how we've done so on our CRM, we're able to tailor content accordingly to their potential purchasing considerations.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The integration process with Netsuite has been quite time-consuming; we began the process back in June, however, have only just got properly integrated in October. This was partly my fault for causing some delays between stages due to other commitments, but it is a particularly long process. It also felt that the integration of the API of Netsuite was a little bit of guesswork, with a lot of trial and error taking place.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a one-man marketing team, my biggest limiting factor is time. A never-ending to-do list and not enough hours in the day. So being able to automate processes and e-shots means I can set up "Set and Forget" automatic campaigns that will work in the background alongside the other work I am doing on other channels. This means that as more and more automatic campaigns are set-up, the more passively generated leads will come in.

initial_reviews.review_title: Innovative platform with potential, but a challenge on-boarding with CRM integration
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The template snippets for the email campaigns were worth the investment. If you plan out your typical email structures and aspirational items, you can get great value from this extra add-on, particularly in time saved and achieving consistency. The layout of the journey manager dashboard makes it easy to understand active and completed count with a health status, equally the layout our the journey is straight forward. It definitely offers more to a 'standard' automation platform, which is why it is an attractive option, we hope to be able to take advantage of these features soon.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The list grouping is more complex than it needs to be, which makes it slightly undesirable. Integrating onto our chosen CRM platform with unique requirements proved a challenge and resulted in a delay in onboarding. The admin/finance side of things could do with being improved too.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's not really solving a problem, it's enhancing a piece of the business which already existed - automated marketing.

initial_reviews.review_title: The platform is very user friendly and the team are knowledgeable!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The platform allows you to customise your emails quickly and easily. For example, we use the genius blocks function so we don't need to create 10 different templates.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Sometimes there can be bugs within the platform that make formatting the templates difficult. We also ask the team to create custom templates for us, which they always do to a high standard but are never editable. This means if we want to make changes to the templates, we have to ask the dev team, which can cause delays.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our business is made up of lots of countries and several divisions, this can make finding a platform that works for everyone complex. However, F24 has allowed us to create separate accounts and domains and share templates between accounts. We also have 2 account managers that help us keep everything consistent and assist with training which is a huge benefit when we're a big organisation.

initial_reviews.review_title: Helpful & insightful with campaigns, offers well thought-out solutions
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The people - you can always get in contact with a member of the team who can help. George was especially useful with several questions we had around the platform but specifically the type of campaigns we are running and what we should be doing more of.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Sometimes sending a test email takes an age.

The other area is amending an image size for an email - it would be really helpful if you had a tool or video explaining how to crop an image so it displays correctly.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Generating sales, welcoming new customers and providing insight reduces the time it takes to send them out manually (or bulk send) from our team internally. The systems also talk to each other, so the sales team don't need to update two platforms, they continue using the CRM as they have been from the beginning.

initial_reviews.review_title: Incredible Account Support and Easy to Use yet Sophisticated Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
I joined my company as an email marketer a couple of months ago and started using Force24 for the first time. The support from Force24 has been nothing but first class.

Firstly, my Account Director Melinda has been incredibly helpful, going above and beyond, supporting me with everything from data cleaning, nurture sequencing and having branded content templates created for me.

The LiveChat feature on the platform is always quick and helpful - my questions are always answered and the support team even provide you with custom videos to illustrate what they are saying.

There are also lots of pre-filmed video training sessions to support new users, as well as weekly live webinars that show different parts of the platform in depth. As well as this, the CEO/Founder Adam is currently running a weekly creative Masterclass focusing on different topics such as email deliverability, SLs and brand strategy.

On top of the strong customer service and support, the platform itself is very easy to use whilst maintaining sophisticated capabilities - there are so many features including SMS, I don't know if I'll ever be able to use them all myself - but I hope to grow my team in the future to fully utilise the Force24 platform to the max.

Thank you Melinda & Team Force24! *****

Nothing - I'm fully satisfied with my experience and have nothing negative to report :)

Email automation and email marketing and deliverability

all_reviews.review_title: Next Level Automated Marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
We were recommended Force24 through our business partner, and given the pain points of the system we were using, we jumped at the opportunity. We were immediately impressed with the UI; it was far more intuitive and accessible. Furthermore, the aspect of automated journeys and the journey manager was way ahead of anything we had seen or used before. This is probably the defining feature; now we have an integration live with our CRM, and we are running several fully autonomous campaigns, which churn out lists of warm leads for our business. With a careful set-up, guided by the plethora of available training material, we found our feet quickly and are already seeing ROI, which we expect to increase as we continue to learn.

What do you dislike about Force24?
We found the editor to be an improvement on our previous system, but still, it can be a little painful. We found the workaround to this, and a very welcome feature is the ability to edit the RAW HTML of the email. While this offers full control over the design, it does require a beginner level of HTML knowledge. Some training on this would be beneficial, mainly as your usual graphic designer or marketer is not likely to be well-versed in HTML and/or CSS.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Force 24 is helping us to work through massive lists of 'passive' contacts on our CRM and work them in the background, encouraging the move to the 'active' market and reducing the number of wasted calls made by our consultants. By providing users with warm leads, ROI is taking a boost as we can get to the right people, quicker.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Force24?
review_question_answers.answer: We were recommended Force24 through our business partner, and given the pain points of the system we were using, we jumped at the opportunity. We were immediately impressed with the UI; it was far more intuitive and accessible. Furthermore, the aspect of automated journeys and the journey manager was way ahead of anything we had seen or used before. This is probably the defining feature; now we have an integration live with our CRM, and we are running several fully autonomous campaigns, which churn out lists of warm leads for our business. With a careful set-up, guided by the plethora of available training material, we found our feet quickly and are already seeing ROI, which we expect to increase as we continue to learn.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Force24?
review_question_answers.answer: We found the editor to be an improvement on our previous system, but still, it can be a little painful. We found the workaround to this, and a very welcome feature is the ability to edit the RAW HTML of the email. While this offers full control over the design, it does require a beginner level of HTML knowledge. Some training on this would be beneficial, mainly as your usual graphic designer or marketer is not likely to be well-versed in HTML and/or CSS.

all_reviews.review_title: Early days but excellent customer support so far
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Force24 has allowed us to take our email campaigns to the next level by integrating with HubSpot, meaning we can not only sync up our CRM but allow our website, CRM and F24 so work seamlessly and remove the manual intervention which has dragged us down in the past.

What do you dislike about Force24?
It's too early to say at the moment as we are fairly new to the platform. The only dislike has come from one or two of our content marketers when first using the platform to build emails but this was purely due to the usual teething problems of learning the platform and how it's laid out, the terminology etc which is slightly different to what they are used to. However, this isn't even a problem now since they are becoming more accustomed to it as we ramp up our usage.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our current platform has no integration to our CRM (HubSpot), therefore we have a large chasm between sales and marketing and need a lot of manual intervention to link anything up. The other solution the platform provides is that it gives us the level of automation for multi-step email campaigns we were looking for, as well as providing more flexibility through it's website tracking capabilities.

all_reviews.review_title: A very sophisticated system that can really enhance your E-Shot & Lead Gen capabilities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The automatic filtering and creation of lists from our CRM is particularly useful. We deal with a diverse range of customers, and by being able to segment them as to how we've done so on our CRM, we're able to tailor content accordingly to their potential purchasing considerations.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The integration process with Netsuite has been quite time-consuming; we began the process back in June, however, have only just got properly integrated in October. This was partly my fault for causing some delays between stages due to other commitments, but it is a particularly long process. It also felt that the integration of the API of Netsuite was a little bit of guesswork, with a lot of trial and error taking place.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a one-man marketing team, my biggest limiting factor is time. A never-ending to-do list and not enough hours in the day. So being able to automate processes and e-shots means I can set up "Set and Forget" automatic campaigns that will work in the background alongside the other work I am doing on other channels. This means that as more and more automatic campaigns are set-up, the more passively generated leads will come in.

all_reviews.review_title: Innovative platform with potential, but a challenge on-boarding with CRM integration
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The template snippets for the email campaigns were worth the investment. If you plan out your typical email structures and aspirational items, you can get great value from this extra add-on, particularly in time saved and achieving consistency. The layout of the journey manager dashboard makes it easy to understand active and completed count with a health status, equally the layout our the journey is straight forward. It definitely offers more to a 'standard' automation platform, which is why it is an attractive option, we hope to be able to take advantage of these features soon.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The list grouping is more complex than it needs to be, which makes it slightly undesirable. Integrating onto our chosen CRM platform with unique requirements proved a challenge and resulted in a delay in onboarding. The admin/finance side of things could do with being improved too.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's not really solving a problem, it's enhancing a piece of the business which already existed - automated marketing.

all_reviews.review_title: The platform is very user friendly and the team are knowledgeable!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The platform allows you to customise your emails quickly and easily. For example, we use the genius blocks function so we don't need to create 10 different templates.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Sometimes there can be bugs within the platform that make formatting the templates difficult. We also ask the team to create custom templates for us, which they always do to a high standard but are never editable. This means if we want to make changes to the templates, we have to ask the dev team, which can cause delays.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our business is made up of lots of countries and several divisions, this can make finding a platform that works for everyone complex. However, F24 has allowed us to create separate accounts and domains and share templates between accounts. We also have 2 account managers that help us keep everything consistent and assist with training which is a huge benefit when we're a big organisation.

The people - you can always get in contact with a member of the team who can help. George was especially useful with several questions we had around the platform but specifically the type of campaigns we are running and what we should be doing more of.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Sometimes sending a test email takes an age.

The other area is amending an image size for an email - it would be really helpful if you had a tool or video explaining how to crop an image so it displays correctly.

all_reviews.review_title: Incredible Account Support and Easy to Use yet Sophisticated Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
I joined my company as an email marketer a couple of months ago and started using Force24 for the first time. The support from Force24 has been nothing but first class.

Firstly, my Account Director Melinda has been incredibly helpful, going above and beyond, supporting me with everything from data cleaning, nurture sequencing and having branded content templates created for me.

The LiveChat feature on the platform is always quick and helpful - my questions are always answered and the support team even provide you with custom videos to illustrate what they are saying.

There are also lots of pre-filmed video training sessions to support new users, as well as weekly live webinars that show different parts of the platform in depth. As well as this, the CEO/Founder Adam is currently running a weekly creative Masterclass focusing on different topics such as email deliverability, SLs and brand strategy.

On top of the strong customer service and support, the platform itself is very easy to use whilst maintaining sophisticated capabilities - there are so many features including SMS, I don't know if I'll ever be able to use them all myself - but I hope to grow my team in the future to fully utilise the Force24 platform to the max.

Thank you Melinda & Team Force24! *****

What do you dislike about Force24?
Nothing - I'm fully satisfied with my experience and have nothing negative to report :)

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email automation and email marketing and deliverability

all_reviews.review_title: A good database marketing email solution for mid-large businesses
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Great control of data inside, filtering, automated segmentation and custom fields make this incredibly powerful. Creating email journeys/sequences is intuitive. Support is one of the best amongst SAAS products.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Creating email templates is clunky and can be frustrating as the line spacing changes everytime you click on edit and CSS just keeps getting added rather than changed. May have to start creating HTML templates elsewhere and copying it in rather than using the editor. Also the deliverability reports are good, but sending campaigns doesn't always seem to actually send to the audience.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to automate campaigns based on dates which means targeting people at the right time. Segmenting lists for different uses is also efficient and easy.

all_reviews.review_title: Good software for the cost, limited for complex use cases.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The ability to hold forms, landing pages and email automation in one place with a simple, albeit flat database. Allows for a lot of opportunities to execute campaigns and will work well for most simple buy-sell businesses.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The simplicity of the system does not allow for complex integrations with CRM systems which is quite limiting, especially for larger organisations that have multiple datasets. These cases have to be flattened through either concatenation or testing their dynamic data setup which is still quite primative.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
If you have a simple business model, absolutely go for it. Great product and simple to get real value out of, however, if your business is more complicated then perhaps another software would be better.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
None.

all_reviews.review_title: On the whole, very good. However, a few issues still need addressing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Without a doubt, the instant intercom chat for ongoing support is what makes Force24 a fantastic company to work with. The system can take a while to get used to, granted. However, this almost becomes irrelevant when their 'free training and support for life' model provides consistent and reliable support to our business. Although every member of the customer service team has been brilliant. I'd like to single out Ellea and Megan for their ongoing support in answering my many questions.

As for the system itself, contact filtering has proven extremely useful when keeping track of specific contacts, and there are still so many additional features I'm learning about to improve each of our email campaign journeys.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The system can be a bit temperamental at times (e.g. error message pop-ups when trying to send test emails) and a few limitations when creating emails and microsites. We are still currently waiting to set up the full automation feature from our side.

What was previously described as a "minor negative" has become an ongoing frustration in that that my comments in the chat aren't always taken in when it comes to the HTML team. When asking for help to make a microsite responsive for mobile, the issue repeats over and over again despite my own efforts to duplicate previously fixed pages to re-use (in an attempt to prevent the issue again). This has been the most frustrating issue for us, as it wastes a lot of time and for a long time nobody helped me prevent these repeated issues - thus having to constantly ask for another fix, delaying our plans for email campaigns. This has only just recently (finally) been explained by Megan to help me prevent this myself in future. Thankfully, I think/hope this will have now resolved the issue going forward.

With little HTML training myself, there's a lot of things I have to manually try and fix myself or ask one of the team to fix when (in theory) shouldn't happen this often. My boss has manually gone in himself to completely recreate a microsite to make it sit how we like it, which is again, is time wasted on our part. Unfortunately, the issue above was passed onto our Account Manager via email and chased up, to which we still have had no response.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
The system is good, but the email creation and design aspects will take some getting used to if you're used to other companies who focus on this. However, the help from customer support makes up for this.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
There's been a few things that have come up that would be useful and that are currently being looked at by the development team (although I can't think what they were now). All my comments are taken on board, however, and reported back to improve the system in the future. As a benefit, the reporting of individual contact activity and finding engaged/unengaged contacts or those with a high lead score is fantastic.

all_reviews.review_title: Incredible potential and extremely helpful support system
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
I love the Journey system, which allows for excellent control over what you send and to who. The drag and drop format enables you to quickly create plenty of different journeys for various tasks, depending on the data you provide. The Support system is also brilliant if you are ever stuck, they're incredibly responsive, and they know their stuff.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The form creator isn't as robust as some competitors' versions, with less versatility and options. When creating landing pages and emails, it is also challenging to create content that is optimised for both mobile and desktop. No individual editor for devices means the creation process is a balancing act when dealing with images.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Make sure to have a plan before creating marketing lists, landing pages, journeys, as these can build up fast. So a plan and a naming convention are essential!

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automating email sends and controlling exactly who the email goes to has meant we can focus more time on more creative tasks.

Once the platform has been set up with the various brand assets such as logos, images and typography by the Force 24 team, it's relatively intuitive to use. The customer service team is swift to respond through the chat facility and will see an issue through to satisfactory completion. There's also the option of additional training sessions to focus on any areas that require extra tuition. The system has speeded up our email creation and delivery while allowing us valuable insights into how individual contacts interact with our content.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Although intuitive, the platform does require a reasonable amount of effort to get used to, in particular the segmentation and filtering options. Onboarding felt a little disjointed with a lot of information supplied in a relatively short period of time. However, the team was personable and certainly knew their stuff.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our email creation, delivery and analytics are greatly enhanced, while our data list analytics is now supply excellent information.   We're also able to easily build landing pages in-house without the need to instruct our web developers.

all_reviews.review_title: Buggy email builder
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The journey manager is by far the best feature of Force24.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The email builder is incredibly buggy, especially the text input. Sometimes when we edit text in the text fields it will screw up the line spacing even though the line spacing is set. Sometimes when we change the line spacing then radnom paragraph breaks appear not only in between oaragraphs, but sometimes before and after too.

Other times we will not be able to delete paragraph breaks in the text editor, and we will have to edit the HTML code to delete the breaks - this sometimes causes all following snippets to disappear, despite the fact we have only deleted a bit of code in the middle of one snippet.

The fonts also do not match between the email builder and the microsite builder, and the options are pretty limited. We also had an issue recently whereby Arial Black (which does not display on iOS) was replaced by a serif font instead of sans-serif, which ruined the look of some of our emails on non-iOS devices.

I have also noticed recently that when displaying on mobile devices that the right margin on text blocks is larger than the left margin, even when the text is centred.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have created journeys to segment engaged and unengaged candidates and clients which really helps us with deciding who to target with what, especially when we have a lot of unengaged contacts we may have not known about otherwise.

all_reviews.review_title: 5 star service from Force24
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
We've been using Force 24 for a few years now, and have been consistently impressed with the exceptionally high levels of customer service we've received from Force24. Their LiveChat function is an absolute lifesaver, the agents answering queries quickly, solving any issues in real-time, and really effectively. This means there is little or no interruption to our workflow when we're stuck either because we don't know how to do something or we have a technical issue that needs addressing. The support we receive is friendly, in plain English, and the agents are proactive in their support, always offering further help should we need it. Not once in all the years we have used Force24 have I had cause for complaint!

In terms of the platform, for a technical ludite such as myself, I find it easy to use and intuitive. I probably only use 10% of its capabilities, but that's the 10% we need!

What do you dislike about Force24?
Honestly, I can't think of anything I dislike about using Force24; we've had no issue at all with the platform since we started using it.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Force24 to send emails to our clients and prospects, to engage them with relevant content and move them along the sales cycle until they are ready to be contacted by a member of the sales team.

UK support is a big selling point compared to competition.

What do you dislike about Force24?

Quicker email template building
Less use of design agencies saving time and money
can automate email marketing and trigger various follow-up emails depending on decision

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to navigate and helpful team!!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The reason I absolutely love using Force24 is how helpful the team are! If you have a query on something - even something small - the response from the chat feature is pretty much instant!! And there are loads of articles that explain step by step the different functions.

That's without mentioning that as an email marketing tool, the drag and drop journeys make it super easy to send multiple campaigns out to different groups and to maintain touch points over a long period easily.

What do you dislike about Force24?
I feel like the creation of templates/designs could be more customisable, sometimes it seems to take a long time to get a template I'm happy with in terms of how it looks.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Realised the benefits in sending an email journey rather than just one sigular campaign as it gives you the opportunity to engage people in different ways - everyone thinks differently!

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use, friendly team, and offers fantastic analytics
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Out of everything I think the drag and drop journey builder is the most innovative feature which i find myself using frequently. The degree to which you can customise campaigns through journeys is extremely effective to the point that you can experiment as much as you please and see how the ROI changes easily.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Due to Outlook not supporting certain features, the email can be presented differently (spacing, minor formatting) in the builder than to the actual email that is sent.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are automating our welcome campaigns to make sure we can always be in touch with highly engaged customers. We are integrating with various platforms to automate data collection through our websites. We are learning more and more through their free training for life to make the most of the platform. We are able to see how our campaigns are performing.

all_reviews.review_title: Has the potential to be a top platform, but missing a few basics
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The journey manager and automated campaigns are very good and time-saving, as well as the genius blocks (could use more fields as the variable rather than just Marketing list)

What do you dislike about Force24?
No Dynamic lists (moving people between lists when a field changes), No exclusion lists when sending ad hoc - currently, you have to create a new list that becomes irrelevant after one send due to the lack of dynamic lists.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Overall, Force24 is... Better than Mailchimp, Simpler than Pardot, Cheaper than both

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Journey Manager has allowed us to plan in sends for our events for three months (we could do the whole year if we wanted!), whereas previously, it was ad hoc. This is a massive time saver and increases the accuracy and consistency of our sends.

all_reviews.review_title: Great UX with Force 24 and the Team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
- User Interface.
Slick, well put together user interface marketing automation tool. Easy to navigate your way around and pick up. There is so much you can do with it and they are continuously looking at ways in which they can improve it.
- Web Activity
I really like being able to see who out of our contacts and what new/potential clients look at on our website. Helps to monitor this daily and reach out to those who keep coming back onto the website. Like the quick LinkedIn feature too which enables you to do some spying and find your contact/lead.
- Friendly & Helpful Staff
I have had numerous training sessions with the team and have found them all beneficial. They go through it in details and help you understand it better if you don't catch it the first time around.  Can always pop a session in the diary too.
- Easy to use
The system is pretty self-explanatory. I just ask a team member on email/intercom if I am not sure.
- Good Customer Support
Always someone there to support you or answer your questions on Intercom.
-Customer journeys.
So many variations, love this feature. So handy!

Worth every penny in my opinion!

What do you dislike about Force24?
- Contact Section.
I find this is not so easy to go through and understand. There are so many drop-down options I find it slightly overwhelming sometimes. If it was easy to use or understand it would not be an issue.
- Web activity does not link with Google Analytics.
This would be really beneficial but maybe I am asking too much!
- Logging Out
Sometimes it randomly logs me out of the system when I am halfway through doing something. However. this does not mean I lose my work, just a tad irritating.
- No undo button.
Would be great if this was a feature when creating emails.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Provides more of an insight into email marketing. I like that this is more in detail.
More options for data strategy.

all_reviews.review_title: Tonnes of features, good value & room to grow!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The automated journey tool is by far the best feature. There are many ways to set a path for most types of the customer journey. It makes events, new campaigns, and keeping on top of different marketing lists a breeze!

The whole team is brilliant at handling any requests that you may have, and nothing is ever too much trouble for them; it's highly appreciated.

What do you dislike about Force24?
There is a steep learning curve when you first get started with the software. Even when you think that you are making excellent progress, you come up against something brand new and have to start the learning process all over again.

Some of the features are hard to figure out or hidden away in the background.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
If Hubspot is too much for your business, then you should seriously consider using Force24. It may not have as many features, but the marketing function is just as good for a fraction of the price.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before Force24, we would manually send out each email as part of a campaign. We'd get the timings wrong, or emails could be sent in duplicate to specific customers.  It would also take us much longer to import customer data from campaigns into our CRM. As well as all this, we had no automation for our communications.

With Force24, we see a considerable uplift in the quality of our customer communications and marketing activity. We're able to build custom landing pages and forms, custom data lists, and more.

all_reviews.review_title: Have used the system in numerous roles and it's never failed to deliver exactly what I need
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
There's a lot to like about the system! The Journey Planner is one of the best I have used, very intuitive and with an abundance of features. I've built out some crazy campaigns that have drawn on emails, texts and direct mail with great success. Whether you want to drive revenue or just automate some BAU processes, then the system can handle it.

The email builder is powerful and 0 code, so no matter the skill level of the people in your team, everyone will be able to build good looking and powerful emails in no time. And for those of you who like to dabble in some code (like myself), you have complete access to do what needs to be done. I've yet to come up against anything that I wanted to do in an email that the system couldn't handle.

Outside of the platform, the support is second to none. No other system (and I have used HUNDREDS) has come close to the level of customer service provided by Force24. Every question, no matter how dumb or complicated, is picked up quickly and usually answered in no time at all. They're also happy to hear about platform suggestions and it genuinely feels like they listen to the customer's needs.

What do you dislike about Force24?
There's very little to dislike about the system, from a personal perspective, I like to be heavily organised and if you start running a lot of campaigns they can be hard to sort through. I've suggested a few features to help organisation within the platform and, hopefully, they will be rolled out in due course.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
For the price you pay, you will not find a better system!

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Force24 helps us in quite a few ways but the biggest benefit is that it allows our team to build campaigns that are truly automated. We can build them, fire them off and pretty much forgot about them as we know they will chug along in the background doing what we want them to do (no matter how complex they are).

They have allowed us to really save a lot of time as processes that were very manual in other systems we previously used, can now be automated quite quickly and the inbuilt website tracking really allows us to get more insight than ever on our customers and tailor campaigns to an extremely personal level.

all_reviews.review_title: Nicely designed UI, easy on the eyes and easy to use & great journey manager!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
- The journey manager - so straight forward! So easy to build a very complex campaign, and quickly.
- The extent you can go to to personalise for campaigns is amazing.
- Ability to view all performance stats in one place.
- Yet to be able to maximise on this but the rating of contacts is cool - look forward to embracing this more with more activity in future!

What do you dislike about Force24?
- The template builder doesn't always render perfectly, takes some getting used to/fiddling around to get it right.
- There are a lot of snippets stored on accounts as well as your own branded ones, & despite the tagging etc. it can be hard to locate snippets easily depending on what you need.
- The dropdown/summary of journeys always displays in a confused order, and changes every time you refresh/re-open. Can sometimes cause concern that a journey is working correctly if in doubt, takes a minute to assess its progress.
- Data upload can be really slow - even with smaller files of 5k contacts (mainly stuck queuing or validating).
- As a business we have 2 accounts, it would be cool to be able to view these within 1 login - or switching accounts within the same login (imagining similar to GA, different views for different sites).

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
- Take time to get to know the order of the processes required to get data uploaded/in to lists for campaigns - depending on what you've used before, it can take a bit of getting used to.
- Set up as many master templates as you can for re-use, with appropriate labelling conventions - and keep the account templates as minimum/organised as possible, it can get crowded!
- If your data is in good condition before integration/upload (ie well completed data with a lot of detail), you'll be in a great position to maximise on the product, if not, it could be limited.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Time efficiency; compared to our previous practise, running campaigns is far more effortless with F24.
- Simplification of complex campaigns; we can set up substantial campaigns in minutes.
- Ability to maintain and assess our email data all in one place.
- Finally managing to run successful split tests on content - this was not as straight forward with our previous methods.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tools backed up by the very best service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The client onboarding process and ongoing support is genuinely the best I've experienced with a SaaS vendor. Force24 is a hugely powerful automation platform so it can take a while to get your head around. The can-do approach, willingness and patience of the team has made us firm advocates for this fabulous business.

What do you dislike about Force24?
So far, really nothing at all. The UI is well thought through, it connects to Salesforce and the visual customer journey mapping is easy to use.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
There are lots of email marketing platforms out there, but I wanted and needed help in getting it set up so went with the business I felt I connected best with. From the very first sales engagement, through on-boarding they team literally knocked it out of the park. Post-implementation, the excellence continues. We're now in the hands of our success manager and the professional services team and they want our success as much as we do.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're automating some of our routine communications tasks using they journey mapping function which supports complex decision-based journeys and highly customisable emails and microsites using segmentable snippets. We're also using it to run non-automated multi-sequence email marketing programmes for our thought leadership programmes. We're getting response rates almost 2x higher than the previous system because we're able to build in such detailed decision trees.

all_reviews.review_title: Force24 review from a recruitment user to gain market knowledge and hot leads
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
The ability to see the opens, clicks etc on any mass mailing. Then we can gauge our data and take out any bad data for the future.

The upsides of using Force24 is it is a platform that brings multiple different platforms into one saving time and also work prospects on an ongoing process not just hitting them the one time.


Also really like the log in page for some reason - the pictures are nice. :)

What do you dislike about Force24?
Would like to add in more personalisation features. For example - company, education etc.

Also if possible would like a added feature of template backgrounds to make the email look more exciting and not just typed information. Integrated Video would be handy as well so the user can watch the video in the email not click on a link and be taken elsewhere. This would build trust with the user. Then tips on how many times the video has been played and be able to collect that data so we can talk to those more warm candidates.

One draw back on the system is that there is too many steps to deploy a message. I suggest a quick streamline add  on to the platform which may benefit quick chains in the middle of the journey?

The formatting on the emails are also not the best, some emails would come through with weird formatting and also a change in font.

So to summarise my dislikes on this platform are the need for more personalisation, have the option for integrated video,

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Good more market information, quick access to consumers and knowing your database. I would recommend it as a platform and also add it into my everyday work as a user of the system.

I would recommend working on the journeys and the different routes it takes each receiver to gather more information and also make your own database. This is a great feature and better than any other on the market that I have tried.

This is also a great platform as you can monitor other members on your team, their marketing journeys and access their analytics too. This provides a complete service when it comes to communication between different members of the company. It was handy for me to keep track of our progress using this system.

I would recommend before using this platform to mail out to your lists - to do tester emails as this will be beneficial to make sure it is the right layout for the intended audience.

All in all this was a easy platform to use and was a great addition to the team on working to bring in more leads and profiles to the team.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
A little bit harder to get hold of at the beginning but worth it after learning the ropes. Maybe some more help on journey set ups?

A handy extra that would be added would be a grouped message. For example if you was going to talk to one sector but wanted to divide it into more senior and junior it would be handy to have them separate journeys that are grouped together.

Benefits of using force24 is being able to get everything out to market in one platform as well. Instead of using multiple

This would make it easier as a user to see and work on it more.

all_reviews.review_title: My company National Friendly have been using Force 24 for almost three years.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
What I like best about Force 24 is the fact that I have my own account handler (Stephanie Smith) who is always a phone call away. Whether she is helping me with the set up of my email template, helping me to implement a strategy around the customer journey or helping my colleagues who are not as familiar with Force 24 with general queries. Stephanie is always quick to find a solution to any potential issue I could be faced with. Overall, Force 24 presents me with all the details I need in relation to my email campaigns and Stephanie feels like an extended member of my team. With her assistance I am always confident that my email campaigns will be a success and that our customers will successfully receive my email communication.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Force 24 isn't the simplest email management system to use, particularly when it comes to building the email templates. My business is unique in the sense that we don't tend to send out weekly email communications and for the most part our emails should be straightforward but for my colleagues who don't use the system as much as me find it rather complex and at times find it quite time consuming.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
As medium sized business, we are still trying to identify how often we should be emailing our customers, whether we need to be more straightforward in our approach and whether or not we are maximising Force 24 capabilities as an email management system. Recently, we brought this to the attention of Graham who has acted fast in providing us with solutions based upon how Force 24 can be flexible and adaptable to our business needs to ensure that our partnership remains useful and beneficial to my business and to our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Great platform with useful features and excellent customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Quick responses regarding queries and questions and the ability to create automated journeys as well as an easy-to-use email builder and great analytics.

The landing page builder is great and easy to use.

All questions have been answered quickly by the Force24 team and the customer service has been excellent.

What do you dislike about Force24?
We have had issues with tests not working correctly and delayed sending. Would be great to have more email templates to work from. One issue is the removal of first name data from contacts that we were not able to do ourselves which would be useful going forward. We have also been having some issues with the templates and how they have been displaying in email clients which has been frustrating. This is an ongoing problem that we are looking to resolve. Would be nice to have more flexitibilty with the unsubscribe page.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
I would highly recommend using force 24 to anyone looking for an easy-to-use email marketing and automation platform that has excellent features and outstanding customer service.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Starting to add personalisation to our emails which is easily done using Force 24. Being able to easily build automated journeys and things like split tests. Easy to remove/add contacts to different lists and being able to build emails faster by using the content builder.

Using the landing page builder is easy and we have been able to create newsletter sign up pages, brochure request pages where we have also set up an automated welcome journey for new subscribers which has beeen very useful and we have seen great results.

We have also been working on a data cleanse which has been very useful in expanding our database whilst maintaining a good health score.

all_reviews.review_title: Brand New Marketing Automation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Force24 offers a sophisticated but straightforward concept and package of Marketing Automation to clients.
They clearly have a wealth of expertise in this area, and do not diversify into too many areas, which makes them a specialist.
The initial contact and stakeholder pitch for the business was enthusiastic and engaging.
The pricing was on point, the product is solid.
They felt like a good partner for our business in terms of size, location and proposition.
We have a very thorough and competent Account manager who is in the detail.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The initial points of contact are not involved in the business to any significant degree beyond the initial engagement. In my experience, a common finding in many third party supplier arrangements, but disappointing given the selection of a smaller business.
Things can take too long to be addressed on occasions, which results in frustration, but appreciating that neither party is perfect.
Sometimes feels too cost orientated, given that we have essentially entered into a long term partnership having placed all of our marketing automation on their platform with plans to move more, and we won't be moving it away any time soon given the efforts/ cost and time involved.
Would like the relationship to be more amicable & proactive in terms of reviews and strategy away from the day to day project delivery.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Ensure scoping is accurate from the outset, all businesses have complexities that are unforseen but it's important to articulate the detail.
This ensures a greater degree of accuracy and more efficient delivery. It's a great product.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Re- marketing - retention of Customers beyond first sale. Starting to see the benefits of customers returning it will take time for the volume to flush through.
Prospect Marketing to completion - in progress
Future projects for additional products and B2B.

all_reviews.review_title: First time using email automation - has taken away what used to be a very manual process !
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Before using Force 24, all of our email campaigns were very labour intensive and it was a very manual process. It does take some time to build your campaign but once live you then haven't got to set yourself reminders as the journey is built and it'll do it all for you.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Nothing i would say i disliked, it takes some time to get your head around the journey builder and depending on how large your campaign is, it can take time to set up your emails and build your microsites etc. but once it's done - you can then leave for Force 24 to send out your emails and add to marketing lists and send reminders etc.

It would be easier if within the email templates, you could add things like bullet points without having to use a certain html code for them.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
We looked at a few different email automation platforms before we decided on Force 24. We liked the functionality, we liked the user friendly platform and it integrates with our CRM.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
As previously mentioned, all of the emails we sent out previously had to be sent out manually and responses dealt with individually. With Force 24, you can upload your contact list - send out your emails and then in the journey builder give an action to those that engage with your emails. Has completely taken away the manual process of sending and responding to email campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Solid tool for email marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
It's a super user friendly platform that you can navigate through easily. Setting up a new email journey is incredibly easy, allowing you to tailor it to your needs. If there are any issues or you have any questions regarding the platform, or even making a campaign better, their support and sales staff are super helpful.

Another great feature is its dashboard function. It gives you a great overview of the performance of all of your campaigns, as well as allowing you to delve deeper and get a more in depth understanding of how each of your campaigns is performing.

I also really rate their search functionality.

What do you dislike about Force24?
I think the way the user can access which contacts are in which campaigns could be better. It can sometimes be a tricky process to get a report on which campaigns certain contacts have received. This isn't a big issue though.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Use the support team available. They're great at helping you get the most out of the platform.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
I use force 24 for managing large data email campaigns. Using the product lets me fully customise the journey for each individual contact, allowing for better click through rates, sign-ups and responses. Since using the product, we've seen a big increase in leads and sales.

We are also seeing a lot more engagement coming through to our website which is increasing sales through other areas of our business. Force 24 allows us to track this web activity and build relationships with target users who are interested in our services.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Force24 are a really easy company to work with. From the initial presentation and proposal, all ideas were presented clearly. Since going live, we have good and prompt communication with our Account Manager. The portal is useful for generating reports related to all of the campaigns we are running. We have only been live a couple of months so it's early days but we are already generating a good number of leads from the campaigns. I would recommend Force24 for any company looking to outsource email marketing as part of a wider strategy for lead gen. We are now coming to the stage where we have sufficient data to be able to evaluate campaign results in order to make improvements and drive more leads at a lower acquisition cost.

What do you dislike about Force24?
There isn't anything in particular. I would recommend for new companies using F24 to go live with one campaign, get this working and then roll out subsequent campaigns. We went live with several at once which got a bit confusing at times.

all_reviews.review_title: A massive leap forward for our marketing and communications
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
We love the journey builder and segmentation tools. We work across multiple audiences that overlap. Using the genius blocks were able to send one email with all the relevant content in for that supporter and have seen engagement grow as a result. The tools are intuitive and reliable. We have automated a daily email we send to contact acts with their help of their engineering team who made it so the data is pulled right of our website, meaning less work and possible errors!
They are always super responsive on the chat, and know their system inside out. Issues or knowledge gaps are closed quickly!The development of new features is regular and they are introduced well.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The only thing that could make it better (or really just take it to perfection for our usage case) is an integration with a payment gateway on forms/on their microsite meaning we could take donations & payments on customised landing pages. But Im sure they will introduce it at some point given the rate of development so far!

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
I would wholeheartedly recommend it as a system if you do not currently use marketing automation. Particularly if you have a varied product offering and multiple potential audiences. Journeys and Genius blocks are by far the most advanced tools I have seen on the market.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest problem we have solved is being able to send bespoke messaging to user groups. We allow users to self select their interests in the sub preferences of the system and then use genius blocks to send relevant information about the areas they have opted into in one email, rather then sending multiple separate emails. Our unsubscribe rate has dropped and our open rate has increased because people are getting the content tailored to them and their interests, not having to wade through content that isn't relevant to them.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy-to-use email automation and incredible support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Force24 has allowed us to not only set up and send out comms to clients and prospects easily and quickly, but the journey manager has been crucial in helping us be more targeted in our approach.

The platform is intuitive and simple to use and navigate. The journey manager in particular is a brilliant tool in setting up automated campaigns.

I can't not mention the fact that the Force24 team are incredibly helpful. You can't beat the Account Managers / customer service - and the online live chat is really useful when you have a quick question that needs resolving ASAP.

What do you dislike about Force24?
In theory, you're able to set up emails and microsites within minutes  (using drop and drag functionality, etc.)  however this does rely on you to have an extensive number of branded assets ready-to-go in your snippets library. Without these, there's not a huge amount of assets to work with, so I'd recommend building out your templates and snippets from the beginning so you're all set.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thought the automated campaigns / Journey Manager we've been able to easily segment our data and send out automated communications based on how users have interacted with us from before.

The use of editable templates has ensured we can get emails out in record time.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool with outstanding support.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Force24 does exactly what it says on the tin, its user-friendly and the support is on hand anytime you need it! The reporting and data analysis is easy to use and understand and detailed information about an individual is clear. Journey mapping is intuitive and possibilities seem endless.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Honestly, not much I dislike about Force24 but if I had to choose something, it would be the simplicity to fully customise email templates without some understanding of coding. With that in mind, the out of the box drag and drop features would still be enough for a new user and support is on hand to help you figure out how to achieve what you need to at any given moment.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Expect to learn some level of coding to easily make completely custom design and function changes yourself. Support can solve almost any problem but could come with an additional cost.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Force24 has given us the opportunity to show our clients the power of having a more personal conversation with their prospects based on having the knowledge and understanding about the people they're engaging with. Our clients have all benefited from being able to automate the process of delivering the most valuable information to them in the right moment of their customer journey.

all_reviews.review_title: New User: Platform Has Great Potential
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Overall, this platform is very easy to use. The interface is quite simple and clear, the snippet function is very easy to use and I like that it stays in shape when I add content. I like how simple it is to add imagery too. I have also found the function to view what my emails would look like on different platforms really useful.
Although I've not personally used the journey manager function, I went through it in the training and thought it was very simple but effective in how to use it.
The help we receive from the team on the chat function, on email and through the training was excellent. The person training us was very engaging, polite and patient with us and all our questions.

What do you dislike about Force24?
I am struggling a little without the use of an undo button and sometimes I forget that I need to switch between the content and layout mode, depending on what I need to do but I think the latter is mostly a case of getting used to new software. I also think the reporting system needs some slightly improvement (e.g. the ability to compare campaign statistics in one report).

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Engage with your team and figure out the requirements you want/need and see if Force24 matches (ours did!). I would also consider how helpful the platform's teams are when asking for help: I've found it to be a struggle before to get useful and timely help/advice with different companies.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're looking at our data and how we can improve it in order to reach our customers more effectively. As a team with members across multiple sites, we're also looking to uniform the way our emails look to provide a more consistent approach with our brands.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
I like the automation journey builder. The blocks are easy to use and it's really visual which assists with showing the planned journey to others in the business.

What do you dislike about Force24?
Finding contact information and reports can be a bit clunky at times.
Also - the drop-down list when building an automated journey can be overwhelming with the selections you need to choose. Refining these would be amazing.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
The online chat is a really beneficial feature as well as the productivity webinars. It's great to work with a supplier that constantly gives guidance to techniques, industry trends and support throughout lifetime of being a client.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Creating automated journeys based on triggers has been really beneficial for a marketing campaign. Having genius blocks available now too makes it a lot easier to set up with targetted content rather than having to duplicate the journey multiple times.

all_reviews.review_title: A strong start with a marketing automation system that has lots of potential
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
I love the very visual way you can build out customer journeys using the journey manager - it's easy to understand and use, and clear to see exactly what you're doing. We are in our very early stages of using the system, but it clearly has masses of potential in terms of building automated journeys and sending personalised communications.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The user experience could be more intuitive in some cases. There are times when I can't immediately see how/where to do something, and on a few occasions it has taken me several clicks to find the right option. This is partly down to me being inexperienced with the system, and I'm sure over time it will become quicker and easier to complete tasks.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Prior to Force24, we had no easy way to communicate with our past and present customer base, and certainly not in an intelligent and timely manner. Communications were adhoc, not very well targeted, and difficult to measure. Force24 makes it so much easier to segment our audiences, understand their wants, needs and intentions based on their behaviour and engagement, and send them the right messages and the right time.

all_reviews.review_title: Ticks every box - and more
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
My favourite thing about Force24 is the unlimited free training & support they offer all their clients. They respond almost instantly within working hours which means I feel empowered by their team to deliver what I set out to. I'm never waiting around for support tickets and someone is always on hand to help me. They are also proactive in reaching out to help educate their clients with webinars, marketing guides, and more.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The only functionality that's missing for me as a marketer at the moment is a pop-up builder. I'd like to be able to capture data of customers on site through this kind of a medium. This is actually something that I have fed back to Force24 and they are currently developing this now.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Such a helpful team and always willing to go the extra mile . They have wowed me and the team

Force24 has enabled us to boost our campaign ROI through being able to talk to customers on a more personal, timely level. We can automate a lot of the heavy lifting we did beforehand through the platform and that leaves me with more time to focus on being creative.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The amount of Aux Fields you get isn't a huge amount - we've had to create workarounds to try and make the data work - but if we could get more aux fields incorporated into the platform the better it would be.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Get a free trial and talk to the people who run the systems. They're incredibly helpful and honest, if their platform isn't right for you then they'll let you know - so there's no reason to not get in touch and find out.

Automated email marketing for our customers -i.e. survey & install reminders, competitions, and review emails.

all_reviews.review_content:

We have been working with Force24 for over 2 years and have been impressed with their levels of service and the quality of their work. We had previously worked with other marketing automation & email companies such as Dotmailer, but have found Force24 to be superior in every aspect.

What do you dislike about Force24?
A few minor teething problems (expected when working with our company, as a highly regulated entity), but these were quickly and efficiently ironed out.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
If you are considering using a marketing automation platform - whether managed or self-service, Force24 are definitely worth considering. For self-service users, their platform is easy to use, whilst their managed services team provide excellent support.

Force24 have allowed us to more intelligently engage with our customers which has had a real effect on both driving revenue and also brand loyalty for the business. This would be significantly more difficult to achieve and likely considerably less cost-effective if attempted in-house.

The level of customer service and professionalism that I received from Force is what set them apart from other Marketing Automation platforms we  have used in the past.
From the initial onboarding process the team helped us  set up the initial user journeys in order to get us up and running and whenever we have any questions (no matter how trivial) there is always someone there to help out and give advice.

all_reviews.review_title: Exceptional Client support and services
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
Force24 have providedng has ever been too much trouble.  an Enterprise level solution with the personal service touch more akin to a local family run business.  Nothing has ever been too much trouble for these guys. I was building a campaign late one night (around 11:30pm) that I wanted to send out the next day... struggling to get it exactly how I wanted it, I chanced the live chat thats embedded in the platform with a "I dont suppose anyones there?"... at which point Stephen Pinkey responded immediately and asked if it as ok to call. He got his laptop out at 11:30pm... logged into the platform from his end and stayed on the line until we had built the campaign to my specifications. He even went into work early the following day to make sure he was on the other end of the line when we pressed send.

In a world that tried to streamline and automate everything, Force24 take such a personalised, hands on approach to their account management and nothing EVER feels like its too much trouble for them. Having came from an email marketing background myself, ex-head of Sales for Communicator, used Act-On, Dotmailer, E-Marsys, Adestra, and more... all I can say is that I've never experienced this level of client care and that i enormously important to me.

What do you dislike about Force24?
While there is nothing specific that I specifically dislike, there are always improvements that can be delivered to any software and Force24 is no different. They, like us  however, are constantly working to improve i

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
The support from the Force 24 team is absolutely unparalleled and I'm happy for anyone to get in touch for a direct reference should they be considering utilising them.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed to create a range or automated marketing campaigns that could be delivered hands free to help us maintain a constant visibility of bran d with our existing and potential clients.

all_reviews.review_title: It's alright
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
It has a lot of interconnected bits for each channel, most of which serve me and my clients' needs particularly well. And I also find that they're committed to the sectors of my client base, which is a nice touch for our agency offering. Force24 also offers a fairly good mix of both automated campaigns and journey manager set ups, though you might need some time to figure out what you want to use. The support is strong, a very friendly staff - UK centric and northern, which will please a certain population of the British Isles, no end. It's something they should take pride in, and do in their own marketing. Rightly so, says I.

What do you dislike about Force24?
No social media functionality, which is sold separately. They tend to use terminology not particularly common within inbound or automation. What is the point of calling them microsites? They're landing pages. No need for it. It can also be a bit cumbersome to figure out the different parts. It feels like a lot of options but should be more simplistic in nature, but this is only a minor quibble as opposed to a full-on moan.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
I think they're heading the right way. Give them a shot.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inbound marketing and marketing automation in a candidate placement capacity. Realizing those benefits are merely in their early days, more to come when we know more. Stay tuned to see if we'll be recouping that spend in the months ahead :-)

all_reviews.review_title: I hope it is going in the right direction, decent start
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Force24?
It has a lot of related channels that can work together, and those channels will allow me to meet the expectations of our clients. They're committed to the sectors of my client base, which is a nice touch for our agency offering, though perhaps somewhat limited and niche for others. Force24 offers both automated campaigns and journey manager setups, though you might need some time to figure out what you want to use. Give it time. UK centric, which is something they should take pride in, and do in their own marketing.

What do you dislike about Force24?
The social media functionality has to be purchased separately, which is a bit of a problem for the true promotion of your automation mechanisms and inbound goals. It can be a bit frustrating to understand the different parts. There's a chance to simplify the platform in the future, which I hope they get to. The microsite concept is a bit odd: coming from a HubSpot background, you just want to have your landing page mechanisms in one place. The microsite notion seems to overcomplicate things.

Recommendations to others considering Force24:
Give it a shot if you work in professional services. It would work best if you also got their social media platform, but make sure that such a purchase isn't cost prohibitive for you to do so.

What problems is Force24 solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are delivering inbound marketing and marketing automation for the clients of our agency. The process of realizing those benefits is early days for the moment, so I'll check in in the future.
